name: Basketball's Just Can't Handle It
description:
Complete this 6 level platformer, it's simple!

Latest Version: 1.1.5

Require Scratch 3 to open .sb3 files and Scratch 2 to open .sb2 files.

Downloads for those are here:

Scratch 3: https://scratch.mit.edu/download

Scratch 2: https://scratch.mit.edu/download/scratch2
